replies.body: Riot are you retarded? Don't you ever read these comments? {{champion:266}} DID NOT NEED CHANGE!!!! Leave his passive the way it originally was BEFORE you added in that stupid "blood rush" ability! IT'S USELESS!!!! Worst game ever now, uninstalling. to the idiot who had the retarded idea of adding in blood rush and removing the original passive....I hope you get fucked by a cactus
Can you have another URF game mode coming up soon again please. URF was so fun

Why tf is it nexus siege again? Of all the rotating game modes, nexus siege is definitely one of the worst, yet it keeps getting put into the rotation like people actually want to play it... Not saying to give us URF like the majority wants, but give us something fun.
Fun? Did you mean Blackmarket Brawlers? The game mode riot is convinced no one wants?
hmmm i want URF back when will it be back? HURRY UP

yall know what we need?
we need pool party urgot if rito makes that then i will play this game until the end of my bloody life{{champion:6}}
{{champion:266}} Nobody understands me... they called my work a hack job!

My patcher never broke in the last 5 years, three of the last 4 patches have fked my client and dont update properly. wtf are you doing rito. whover you hired recently to do this stuff put his/her ass back on the fucking street and hire somebody who knows how to code plz
shouldn't galio be drinking a health pot instead of mana pot in his debonair skin now? {{item:2003}}

This is now a thing on OCE
